Constructor Detail

WYSIWYMinterface

public WYSIWYMinterface()
Method Detail

onModuleLoad

public void onModuleLoad()
This is the entry point method. It creates the servlet and initialises the session.

getUser

public String getUser()
Reads the user ID from a Cookie. If there is no Cookie, displays a message that the session has expired.

Returns:
String user ID, or null if there is no cookie

getUserName

public String getUserName()
Returns the name of the user.

Returns:
String username, or null if the session is expired.

getHandler

public LiberServletAsync getHandler()
Returns the servlet

Returns:
LiberServletAsync

submit

public void submit(int type,
                   String key)
Submits the extended resource description.

Parameters:
type - Session type (edit, query, browse)
key - Session ID

close

public static void close()
Closes LIBER

submit

public void submit(int type,
                   String key,
                   BrowsingTab bt)
Submits the resource description.

Parameters:
type - Session type
key - Session ID
bt - BrowsingTab, so it can be closed

addBrowsingTab

public void addBrowsingTab(BrowsingTab bt)
Adds a browsing tab to display

Parameters:
bt - BrowsingTab

showHourglass

public void showHourglass()
Shows an hourglass or waiting cursor, and ensures the user cannot do anything while it is displayed

hideHourglass

public void hideHourglass()
Sets the cursor back to normal

resetHourglass

public void resetHourglass()
LIBER counts the time that the hourglass has been showing (for previous evaluation purposes). This method resets the counter

onWindowClosed

public void onWindowClosed()
Removes the user session from the server

onWindowClosing

public String onWindowClosing()
Checks if the user has an unsubmitted description. If so, displays warning.

Returns:
String warning, or null if the window should be closed.
